Package mgui.interfaces.graphics

Class InterfaceGraphicTextBox

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JLabel
mgui.interfaces.InterfaceTextBox
mgui.interfaces.graphics.InterfaceGraphicTextBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, GraphicListener, GraphicMouseListener, GraphicPropertyListener, InterfaceMouseListener
public class InterfaceGraphicTextBox
extends InterfaceTextBox
implements GraphicMouseListener, GraphicPropertyListener
Represents a labelled text box which updates from mouse movement events on its registered InterfaceGraphic components. Useful for implementing an updating status bar.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrew Reid
See Also:
Serialized Form
